description:
go.tools/go/types: rename Context -> Config (more apt name)

Also: Various minor cleanups.

messages.text:
Hello adonovan@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5a9c2a38449e&repo=tools ***

go.tools/go/types: rename Context -> Config (more apt name)

Also: Various minor cleanups.

R=adonovan, r
CC=golang-dev
